Igwe  Nwoke bụ akwụkwọ nke Marc Fasteau dere n'oge ifufe nke abụọ nke feminism na United States
E bipụtara ya n'ọnwa Septemba 1, n'ime afọ 1974 site n'aka McGraw-Hill.

Akwụkwọ ahụ nyochara atụmanya nwoke na nwanyị na-emebi emebi nke ụmụ nwoke na-eche ihu. Site ná nghọta onwe onye na ahụmịhe, onye edemede ahụ na-enyocha akụkọ ifo màkà nwoke na mmetụta mbibi ha na ọha mmadụ.
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ n'ọnwa Septemba 1, n'ime afọ 1974, ma bipụta ya nke atọ na Disemba 1974
Akwụkwọ ahụ natara ma Hardcover na Paperback ntọhapụ
A naghizi ebipụta akwụkwọ ahụ ugbu a.
Etolitere akwụkwọ ahụ nke ukwuu mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya site na akwụkwọ ndị inyom dịka Ms

Magazine, onye nchoputa Gloria Steinem toro Fasteau dị ka "onye nledo n'ọkwa nke ụmụ nwoke ọcha ma kwupụta ya na òtù nnwere onwe nke ụmụ nwoke “mgbanwe ahụ bụ ọkara ọzọ.” Mana akwụkwọ ahụ enwetaghị nkatọ na-adịghị mma n'èzí ndị inyom
Larry McMurtry nke NY Times kwuru, "Nkowa [n'akwụkwọ] na-adị mgbe ụfọdụ ma na-emetụ n'obi mgbe niile, mana ụfọdụ ngwa ngwa na-eme ka ụda ahụ ghara ịdị ọcha
